original_text: You shall do the same with your oxen and with your sheep: seven days it shall be with its mother; on the eighth day you shall give it to me.
korean_text: 네 소와 양도 그와 같이 하되 이레 동안 어미와 함께 있게 하다가 여드레 만에 내게 줄지니라

sentences.original_text: You shall do the same with your oxen
seven days it shall be with its mother;
sentences.korean_translation: 이레 동안은 어미와 함께 있게 하고

sentences.original_text: you shall give it to me.
